attributes.contentHtml:
@Oliver1234dotdot

The Metasploit framework is a very powerful tool which can be used by cybercriminals as well as ethical hackers to probe systematic vulnerabilities on networks and servers. Because itâ€™s an open-source framework, it can be easily customized and used with most operating systems.

With Metasploit, the pen testing can use ready-made or custom code and introduce it into a network to probe for weak spots. As another flavor of threat hunting, once flaws are identified and documented, the information can be used to address systemic weaknesses and prioritize solutions.

He's basically a skid <3
